title: Remove Falsy Values in Python List
description: In this challenge, you need to demonstrate your understanding of list manipulation and the concept of falsy values in Python by writing a function that removes all falsy values from a given list.

meta.title: Python Compact List | Programming Tutorials
meta.description: This challenge tests the understanding of Python's built-in `filter()` function and the concept of falsy values in Python.
meta.keywords: Python, Programming, List, Compact, Falsy Values
